Player History

Had first career hit on 4/10/2012, off Aaron Laffey (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/2012, off Huston Street (MIN)...
Traded from Cleveland to Pittsburgh on 3/2/2014 (Going to PIT: 2B R. Weeks, 3B A. Littlejohn, P J. Lester, P R. Perry. Going to CLE: 3B J. Arias, 3B R. Shaffer, P D. Bundy, P B. Halsey)...

Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/8/2016...

Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 5/19/2017...
